page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This area of Notts. Dukeries is mainly agricultural with much of the land being used for forestry, sheep grazing and with a limited amount of arable farming.This work is carried out by the two main companies in the area.The Welbeck Estates Company Ltd. land covers some arable and grazing land and a large area of forestry. This borders on Worksop Manor Est. Ltd. land which has forestry, arable and high quality grassland (A stud farm). Wildlife is abundant in the area with some 230 different species of birds living in the forest. To the NE there is Manton,a small residential area to the South of Worksop.This has 4 schools,including Worksop College a public school with extensive grounds.The new Worksop by-pass is under construction and this will run to the South of Manton
